localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Finding what to watch, read, or eat has become too difficult. So we created Friendspire, a simpler way to find and save new favorites. 🔍 Better 🎥📺📚🎙️🍴🍷 recommendations 🔖 Save and ➕ rate in one place 🗒️ Discover & build lists 🤝 Connect with friends
blogPost.body: Finding what to watch, read, or eat has become too difficult. So we created Friendspire, a simpler way to find and save new favorites. 🔍 Better 🎥📺📚🎙️🍴🍷 recommendations 🔖 Save and ➕ rate in one place 🗒️ Discover & build lists 🤝 Connect with friends
blogPost.title: Friendspire 2.0 - Find better recommendations for what to watch, read or eat
blogPost.author: M Dorsett

localize.description: 寻找观看、阅读或吃的东西已经变得太困难了。所以我们创建了Friendspire，一个更简单的方式来寻找和保存新的收藏夹。🔍更好 🎥📺📚🎙️🍴🍷推荐 🔖保存和➕率在一个地方 🗒️发现和建立列表 🤝与朋友连接。
localize.tagline: 找到更好的推荐，看什么，读什么，吃什么。

localize.description: 尋找觀看、閱讀或喫的東西已經變得太困難了。所以我們創建了Friendspire，一個更簡單的方式來尋找和保存新的收藏夾。🔍更好 🎥📺📚🎙️🍴🍷推薦 🔖保存和➕率在一個地方 🗒️發現和建立列表 🤝與朋友連接。
localize.tagline: 找到更好的推薦，看什麼，讀什麼，喫什麼。

previous.title: Bill Gates says cryptocurrency is one innovation the world could do without https://t.co/sMK9btiF7U

localize.full_text: 比尔-盖茨表示，加密货币是世界可以不需要的一种创新https://t.co/sMK9btiF7U。
比爾-蓋茨表示，加密貨幣是世界可以不需要的一種創新https://t.co/sMK9btiF7U。

next.excerpt: We scrapped the Likes, feed, and spammy messages to finally bring aligned professionals together meaningfully. 600+ tech leaders meet regularly through hand-curated introductions and Office Hours over video to accelerate their progress.
next.title: Kinetic - Meet co-founders, mentors, advisors, investors, & customers

localize.description: 我们取消了点赞、馈赠和垃圾信息，终于把对齐的专业人士有意义地聚集在一起。600+技术领袖通过精心策划的介绍和视频办公时间定期会面，加速他们的进步。
localize.tagline: 与联合创始人、导师、顾问、投资人和客户见面。

localize.description: 我們取消了點贊、饋贈和垃圾信息，終於把對齊的專業人士有意義地聚集在一起。600+技術領袖通過精心策劃的介紹和視頻辦公時間定期會面，加速他們的進步。
localize.tagline: 與聯合創始人、導師、顧問、投資人和客戶見面。
